trans-unit.source: Command used to migrate project.json projects to msbuild
trans-unit.target: Command used to migrate project.json projects to msbuild

trans-unit.source: The path to - a project.json file to migrate. or - a global.json file, it will migrate the folders specified in global.json. or - a directory to migrate, it will recursively search for project.json files to migrate. Defaults to current directory if nothing is specified.
trans-unit.target: The path to - a project.json file to migrate. or - a global.json file, it will migrate the folders specified in global.json. or - a directory to migrate, it will recursively search for project.json files to migrate. Defaults to current directory if nothing is specified.

trans-unit.source: Base MSBuild template to use for migrated app. The default is the project included in dotnet new.
trans-unit.target: Base MSBuild template to use for migrated app. The default is the project included in dotnet new.

trans-unit.source: The version of the sdk package that will be referenced in the migrated app. The default is the version of the sdk in dotnet new.
trans-unit.target: The version of the sdk package that will be referenced in the migrated app. The default is the version of the sdk in dotnet new.

trans-unit.source: The path to the xproj file to use. Required when there is more than one xproj in a project directory.
trans-unit.target: The path to the xproj file to use. Required when there is more than one xproj in a project directory.

trans-unit.source: Skip migrating project references. By default project references are migrated recursively.
trans-unit.target: Skip migrating project references. By default project references are migrated recursively.

trans-unit.source: Output migration report to the given file in addition to the console.
trans-unit.target: Output migration report to the given file in addition to the console.

trans-unit.source: Output migration report file as json rather than user messages.
trans-unit.target: Output migration report file as json rather than user messages.

trans-unit.source: Skip moving project.json, global.json, and *.xproj to a `backup` directory after successful migration.
trans-unit.target: Skip moving project.json, global.json, and *.xproj to a `backup` directory after successful migration.
